abstract: As it builds out its portfolio of cloud-based offerings, Oracle has agreed to acquire RightNow Technologies, a provider of Web-based customer service solutions.
snippet: As it builds out its portfolio of cloud-based offerings, Oracle has agreed to acquire RightNow Technologies, a provider of Web-based customer service solutions.

headline.main: Oracle in $1.43 Billion Deal for RightNow
headline.print_headline: Oracle to Buy a Company Valued for Its Web Services
